latest.title: Director Dealing
latest.content:
13 Oct 2025 07:00
RNS Number : 0756D
Tialis Essential IT PLC
13 October 2025
Tialis Essential IT Plc
("Tialis" or the "Company")
13 October 2025
Dealing by Director
Tialis, the mid-market network, cloud and IT Managed Services provider,
announces that
Ian Smith, a director of the Company, acquired 31,000 ordinary shares of 1p each
in the Company ("Ordinary Shares") through his Self-Invested Personal Pension ("SIPP") at 60p per Ordinary Share on 10 October 2025.
Following this transaction, Mr Smith's beneficial interest in the Company is 678,166 Ordinary Shares, which represents 1.70% of the Company's issued ordinary share capital.
Mr Smith is also the Chief Executive Officer and major shareholder of MXC Capital Limited ("MXC"). MXC's holding in the Company is 26,722,891 Ordinary Shares representing 67.0% of the Company's issued ordinary share capital. Mr Smith and MXC hold in aggregate 27,401,057 Ordinary Shares, representing 68.7% of the Company's issued ordinary share capital.
Further details of the PDMR dealing are included below. This information has been provided in accordance with Article 5(1)(b) of the Market Abuse Regulation (EU) No 596/2014 which is part of UK law by virtue of the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018.
For more information, contact:
Tialis Essential IT Plc
Ian Smith, Executive Director
Tel: +44 (0)344 874 1000
Cavendish Capital Markets Ltd
Nominated Adviser and Broker
Corporate finance: Jonny Franklin-Adams/ Elysia Bough
Corporate Broking: Tim Redfern
Tel: +44 (0)20 7220 0500
NOTIFICATION AND PUBLIC DISCLOSURE OF TRANSACTIONS BY PERSONS DISCHARGING MANAGERIAL RESPONSIBILITIES AND PERSONS CLOSELY ASSOCIATED WITH THEM

Proven winner - previously hit lock-in target

reasons_to_sell.reason: Stale signal - not for active trading

trader_plan.risk: Invalidation = breaks recent lows / dilution / suspension

investor_plan.thesis_conditions: Unlock after AI triangulation + CONFIRMED timing

commentary.executive_summary: Note: this report used historical signals only — live triangulation (RNS, social, Trends) was not available. Current setup looks like EARLY_BUILD with an APEX score of 50/100. Historically there have been 6 rallies (avg. 152%); the position is now +21.3%. Practical take: this is interesting but unconfirmed — wait for an AI snapshot or clear confirmation before committing size.
bull_case: Early accumulation — good risk/reward if it confirms
bear_case: No immediate red flags, but keep stops tight
commentary.timing_translation: Accumulation in progress. Consider small starters but wait for confirmation before sizing up.
commentary.confidence_explained: Confidence 50/100 — data triangulated from RNS, social and Trends.
